entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: --- title: Hello World date: 2018-03-20 tags: Others --- # Hello World Finally, done with the construction. Mainly for technology sharing and discussing, and occasionally talk about other stuff. ðŸ˜‚ Introduction: - Ideas: Inspiration sharing - Books: Book recommendation - Courses: Course collection ``` Java // Java class HelloWorld { public static void main() { System.out.println("Hello World!"); } } ``` ``` C++ // C++ #include "iostream" int main() { std::cout < "Hello World!" < std::endl; return 0; } ``` ``` C // C #include "stdio.h" int main() { printf("Hello World!\n"); return 0; } ``` ``` Python # Python print("Hello World!") ``` ``` JavaScript // JavaScript Console.log("Hello World!"); ```
